name: Guardian of the Forgotten Garden
description:
The bugs are destroying the garden! Fight back the bugs and claim back your garden! Plant flowers and dodge bugs in this fun, mini shoot-em-up!

Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • 'z' or 'j' to shoot and plant on flower beds (purple tiles)
Personal Stats
  • First Game Jam!
  • First published game!
  • First time making game music!
